entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 8.
